public class BannerAdUnit extends BannerBaseAdUnit

      configId - config id
      width - ad width
      height - ad height

    • BannerAdUnit

      public BannerAdUnit(String configId, int width, int height, EnumSet<AdUnitFormat> adUnitFormats)
      Constructor with ad formats.
      Parameters:
      configId - config id
      width - ad width
      height - ad height
      adUnitFormats - ad formats (AdUnitFormat).
      For multi-format request EnumSet.of(AdUnitFormat.DISPLAY, AdUnitFormat.VIDEO);
      For only video request EnumSet.of(AdUnitFormat.VIDEO);
